GET INVOLVED

Help us make AI education accessible to everyone in Newark. No technical background required!

Why Volunteer?

Our volunteers are the heart of Newark AI Town Hall. Whether you're an AI expert or just curious about the technology, there's a place for you to make a difference in our community.
